title: Sartunset Over the Hills
desc: Self-taught artist living and working in Cape Town, Dry’s large-scale drawings in graphite often speak to isolation, self discovery, loneliness and relationship. Strong motifs of nature, decay and healing are often used to articulate a non verbal feeling. These drawings are hyperrealistic in style and surreal in content – they appear at once lifelike and dreamlike, being neither real nor imagined.

title: Urban Dreams
desc: An abstract interpretation of city life, blending chaos and harmony in a colorful palette.
